title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 331.2 - Purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 331.2 - Purposes

State Regulations

The senate shall be the official agency through which the
university faculty engages in the governance of the university. The senate
shall be concerned with effective educational policies and other professional
matters within the university. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
331.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
